meta.title: The daily word game
meta.description: Guess the hidden word in 6 tries (or less). A new puzzle is available each day!
meta.keywords: english, puzzle, word, play, game, online, guess, daily

text.no_attempts: You haven't tried any words yet!

help.title: How to Play
help.text_1_2: Each guess must be a valid five letter word. Press the enter button to submit your guess.
help.text_1_3: After you guess, the tiles will change color to indicate which letters of your word are correct or almost correct.
help.text_2_1: is in the word and in the correct location!
help.text_2_2: is in the word, but not in the correct location.
help.text_2_3: is not present in the word you are trying to guess.
help.text_3: A new word will be available each day!
